name: simple-portfolio-page-template-with-colorful-effect
title: Simple Portfolio Template With Colorful Effect
desc: Beautiful template for those who seeking catchy and performant design.
article:
• Built with Astro framework for fast performance.
  • Perfect performance with full SEO optimization for better search rankings.
  • Styled using Tailwind CSS for responsive, customizable design.
  • TypeScript enhances the development experience with strong typing.
  • Catchy, colorful design ensures a memorable visual experience.
  • Engaging animations with interactive cursor and hover effects.
  • Utilizes JSON, making content easy to edit and highly flexible.
  • Ideal for creating a memorable online presence.


LIVE DEMO URL - https://www.kuktenko.dev/

github.name: kandy.app
github.description: Personal website created using Astro 4.0 and Tailwind CSS.
